name: junit-reporting-examples
description: A Node.js project with comprehensive tests for testing JUnit reporting tools

scripts.test:all: npm run test:ci && npm run test:playwright
scripts.allure:generate: sh -c '[ -d allure-results ] && npx allure-commandline generate --clean allure-results -o allure-report || npx allure-commandline generate --clean . -o allure-report'
scripts.robot:venv: python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -U pip && pip install -r robot/requirements.txt && rfbrowser init
scripts.robot:stage: rm -rf pages/robot && mkdir -p pages/robot && cp -r robot/output/* pages/robot/
scripts.extent:stage: if [ -d extent-report ]; then rm -rf pages/extent && mkdir -p pages/extent && cp -r extent-report/* pages/extent/; fi

author: Test Author
